name: Dinusha Vatsalan
content: Dinusha Vatsalan - Macquarie University View Scopus Profile Dinusha Vatsalan Dr Honorary Senior Lecturer, School of ComputingFuture Communications Research Centre https://orcid.org/0000-0001-6713-7667 Phone+61 2 9850 9541Emaildinusha.vatsalanmq.eduau h-index 1130 Citations 16 h-index Calculated based on number of publications stored in Pure and citations from Scopus 20142025 Research activity per year Personal profile BiographyDr Dinusha Vatsalan joined the School of Computing at Macquarie University in May 2022 as a Senior Lecturer in Cyber Security. Dinusha received her PhD in Computer Science from Australian NationalUniversity and BSc (Hons) from University of Colombo, Sri Lanka. She wasa Research Scientist at Data61, CSIRO.Her research interests include privacy-preserving technologies forrecord linkage, data mining, machine learning, data sharing, and dataanalytics, privacy attacks and defences, and privacy riskquantification. Dinusha has authored over 60 scientific articles inthese research topics, and received several awards and grants, includingthe Australian government’s prestigious Endeavour Postgraduate Research Award, Ruby Payne-Scott Award (CSIRO), Women in Science Career Award (CSIRO), Data61 Research Plus PhD Scholarships, Australia-Germany Joint Research Cooperation Scheme, and National best e-Content Award (Sri Lanka).Research interestsPrivacy-preserving record linkagePrivacy-preserving data sharing and analyticsPrivacy-preserving machine learningPrivacy attacks and defenses Privacy risk quantification Education/Academic qualificationComputer Science, PhD, PhD in Computer Science, Australian National University27 Jan 2011 → 23 Oct 2014Award Date: 16 Dec 2014Information and Communication Technology, BSc (Hons), BSc (Hons) in Information and Communication Technology, University of Colombo School of Computing10 May 2005 → 30 Jun 2009Award Date: 15 Sept 2009 Fingerprint Dive into the research topics where Dinusha Vatsalan is active.
